Hi, I’m Bansi Kachar

I’m an analyst focused on digital marketing and data analytics. I turn raw data into clear, actionable insights—mixing technical skill with creative strategy to produce results.

About Me

I’m pursuing an M.S. in Digital Marketing at Cal Poly Pomona (expected May 2026). I work across R, Python, and web analytics—building dashboards, teaching hands-on workshops, and creating reproducible work with Quarto to tell clear data stories. :contentReferenceoaicite:0

What I Do

Data Analysis & Visualization: Build interactive, informative visuals in R and Python.

Digital Marketing Strategy: Use web analytics, SEO, and campaign insights to improve performance.

Workshops & Training: Teach practical, hands-on sessions for students and professionals.

Reproducible Reporting: Create integrated reports and sites with Quarto. :contentReferenceoaicite:1

Let’s Connect

I’m always open to collaborating and sharing ideas—reach out or connect with me on LinkedIn.

Welcome to my portfolio—where data meets creativity and reproducibility supports innovation.
